hadiths.text: Abu Barzah narrated:"The Prophet would dislike to sleep before Isha and to talk after it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ النَّوْمِ قَبْلَ الْعِشَاءِ وَالسَّمَرِ بَعْدَهَا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Sleep Before Isha And To Talk During The Night After It
